Related repos

  • Node editor for creating FastMCP servers
  • TypeScript library and utilities for connecting to remote Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers
  • connect Claude, Gemini, Cursor, and coding tools with MCP
  • turns ComfyUI workflows into MCP tools without code, supports text/image/audio/video generation on local or cloud infrastructure
  • Generates diagrams from codebases
  • TypeScript UI framework inspired by React, Solid, and Svelte
  • MCP server for Unity Editor actions
  • TypeScript SDK for building and deploying MCP servers
  • open source visual web builder for designers and devs
